Package Controller

Class PromotionController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PromotionController
public class PromotionController extends Object
A controller that is responsible for managing the promotion packages of the restaurant.
Since:
10 October 2021

  • Constructor Details

    • PromotionController

      public PromotionController()
      Constructs the PromotionController object. It will read the existed promotions that are saved in the promotion.txt, and then instantiate the promotions and their respective items ony by one.

  • Method Details

    • addPromotion

      public boolean addPromotion(List<String> promoParams, List<String> items)
      Adds a new promotion to the menu.
      Parameters:
      promoParams - A list of String objects that includes the information of this promotion (promotion id, promotion name, promotion description, and promotion price).
      items - A list of String objects that includes the information of all Item objects in this promotion (item id, item name, item description, and item price).
      Returns:
      true if this promotion is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • copyPromotion

      public Promotion copyPromotion(int promoId)
      Returns a Promotion object which is a copy version of another promotion (different hash identity).
      Parameters:
      promoId - The id of the promotion to be copied.
      Returns:
      A Promotion object if this id is existed, null otherwise.

    • findPromotionById

      public Promotion findPromotionById(int promoId)
      Returns the actual Promotion object in the list (same hash identity).
      Parameters:
      promoId - The id of the promotion to be search.
      Returns:
      The actual Promotion object in the list.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the attributes of all the promotions and their respective items.

    • removePromotion

      public boolean removePromotion(int promoId)
      Removes a specific promotion from the list.
      Parameters:
      promoId - The id of the promotion to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the promotion is removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(int promoId, List<String> itemParams)
      Adds an item to an existing promotion.
      Parameters:
      promoId - The id of the promotion to be updated.
      itemParams - A list of String objects that includes the information of the item (item id, item name, item description, and item price).
      Returns:
      true if this item is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(int promoId, int itemId)
      Removes an item from an existing promotion.
      Parameters:
      promoId - The id of the promotion to be updated.
      itemParams - A list of String objects that includes the information of the item (item id, item name, item description, and item price).
      Returns:
      true if this item is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateItem

      public boolean updateItem(int promoId, List<String> itemParams)
      Updates the attributes of items in a promotion that have the same item id.
      Parameters:
      itemParams - A list of String objects that includes the information of the item (item id, item name, item description, and item price).
      Returns:
      true it is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • updatePromotion

      public boolean updatePromotion(List<String> promoParams)
      Updates the information of a promotion.
      Parameters:
      promoParams - A list of String objects that includes the new information of the promotion (promotion id, promotion name, promotion description, and promotion price).
      Returns:
      true it is updated successfully, false otherwise.
